Posts.Content: Jul 18, 2009 05:33PM tdoehne wrote: Dear New Comer, I am a new comer as well, just posted today for the first time, My best friend showed me this website. I just had a mastectomy done one week ago. I feel completely lost and alone in all of this. I am stage three with several questions still unanswered. I do know that I will get my port placed next Friday and chemo will start shortly thenafter. I am hoping this site will help us both as we begin our journey. All my best to you and I will be thinking of you, Tara.
Posts.Title: New Comer AsiaYM victoriasecret
